1793.description: Build the Property Scanning Device on any Property world, then return to Dr. Overbuild.

1796.description: Find all 10 of Hael Storm's escaped parrots in Nexus Tower.

1797.description: Touch the Imagination Orb to clear the Maelstrom from the Property.

1799.description: Use Vanda Darkflame's Maelstrom Orb to learn its dark secrets.

1802.description: Smash 3 Skeleton Engineers in the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.

1804.description: Talk to Coalessa about the Skeleton Dragon pet.

1805.description: Find 10 bones from Bone Digs on Crux Prime, then take them back to Mardolf in Nimbus Station.

1806.description: Take the Maelstrom Crystal to Echs Ray, the Paradox Scientist in Forbidden Valley.

1807.description: Build and interact with Echs Ray's console to analyze the Skeletons' Maelstrom Crystal.

1808.description: Return to Neido on Crux Prime with news about the Skeletons' Maelstrom Crystal.

1841.description: Collect all three Starskull Rocket parts.

1843.description: Collect the Fright Speed Front and Rear Bumpers and Side Panels.

1844.description: Collect the Fright Speed Engine Panel and Rear Panel.

1846.description: Vanda Darkflame wants you to spy on Duke Exeter while wearing your Sentinel Box Disguise.

1848.description: Vanda Darkflame wants you to spy on Dr. Overbuild while wearing your Assembly Box Disguise.

1849.description: Vanda Darkflame wants you to spy on Hael Storm while wearing your Venture League Box Disguise.

1851.description: Touch the Imagination Orb to clear the Maelstrom from the Property.

1853.description: Find the 15 floating treasure chests that Johnny Thunder hid in Nexus Tower.

1854.description: Interact with 3 of the vendors in Nexus Tower.

1855.description: Interact with 4 more vendors in Nexus Tower.

1856.description: Interact with 6 more vendors in Nexus Tower.

1857.description: Interact with 4 more vendors in Nexus Tower.

1858.description: Interact with the water fountains in Nexus Tower 25 times.

1859.description: Use any of the shortcuts in Nexus Tower 20 times.

1860.description: Use any of the shortcuts in Nexus Tower 20 more times.

1861.description: Use any of the shortcuts in Nexus Tower 40 more times.

1862.description: Use the Soap Gun to clean up 24 dirt clouds in Nexus Tower.

1863.description: Tame your Faction pet in Nexus Tower.

1865.description: Expand 120 slots in your Vault account.

1869.description: Score 100 damage points at the Sentinel Combat Challenge in Nexus Tower.

1870.description: Score 240 damage points at the Sentinel Combat Challenge in Nexus Tower.

1871.description: Score 290 damage points at the Sentinel Combat Challenge in Nexus Tower.

1873.description: Look into the Paradox Maelstrom Orb in Nexus Tower 15 times.

1875.description: Use an Action Emote to wake up Yawny Goodknight, the Sentinel Checkpoint Guard in Nexus Tower.

1887.description: Take 5 Blue Imaginite to the Nexus Naomi console in Nexus Tower to expand your Vault account.

1888.description: Take 10 Blue Imaginite to the Nexus Naomi console in Nexus Tower to expand your Vault account.

1902.description: Complete 20 more Missions or Achievements in Nexus Tower, for a total of 40.

1905.description: Equip all 6 pieces of the Rank 3 Knight gear.

1908.description: Follow the Venture League logos to find Hael Storm in Nexus Tower.

1912.description: Follow the Paradox logos to find Vanda Darkflame in Nexus Tower.

1913.description: Fly to Nexus Tower and talk to Nexus Naomi.

1915.description: Use the Nexus Naomi console in the Sentinel War Room to open a Vault account.

1916.description: Hael Storm wants you to talk to Coalessa in Pet Cove about a Venture League pet.

1917.description: Take the Stegosaurus Treat back to Hael Storm in Nexus Tower.

1918.description: Interact with the bowl in the Venture League Observatory, then tame the Stegosaurus pet.

1919.description: Dr. Overbuild wants you to talk to Coalessa in Pet Cove about an Assembly pet.

1920.description: Read all of the Story Plaques in Nexus Tower.

1924.description: Tame the Sentinel pet atop the Pet Cove Lighthouse.

1925.description: Vanda Darkflame wants you to talk to Coalessa in Pet Cove about a Paradox pet.

1931.description: Use the Imagination Backpack to heal Rutger Hemogoblin in the Paradox Vendor area of Nexus Tower.

1978.description: Smash 5 Dark Spiderlings in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

1982.description: Smash 5 Stromling Pirates in Gnarled Forest.

1983.description: Smash 5 rock piles in Forbidden Valley.
